member.name: D3D12_WAVE_MMA_TIER
member.summary: Defines constants that specify a level of support for WaveMMA (wave_matrix) operations.

member.name: D3D12_WAVE_MMA_TIER.D3D12_WAVE_MMA_TIER_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: Specifies that WaveMMA (wave_matrix) operations are not supported.

member.name: D3D12_WAVE_MMA_TIER.D3D12_WAVE_MMA_TIER_1_0
member.summary: Specifies that WaveMMA (wave_matrix) operations are supported.
